name: feishu-bookmark-extension
description: 将网页收藏同步到飞书多维表格的浏览器扩展插件

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r popup/ background/ content/ options/ assets/ *.json *.md dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../feishu-bookmark-extension-v$npm_package_version.zip .
scripts.dev: npm run copy-files && echo '开发环境准备完成，请在Chrome中加载dist目录'
scripts.test: echo '请在浏览器中打开test.html进行功能测试'

author: 飞书收藏插件开发团队
